item.description:
Hey Gang. A lot of friends want to drum Friday night so I created a place to play for us. November 7, 2008 We will meet at 7PM at the DrumRoom, 50 Tufts Street, Arlington, MA 02474. Looks like some fine folk will be stopping by so maybe you can come too!

We will open the doors at 6:45PM and drum till 9:00PM Bring a drum if you have one or use one of ours. We have plenty to go around.

We will ask for a donation of $15.- each which I will bring to Africa when I go on November 18th. All funds will go to help people in Guinea.

We'll have some refreshments for you also. I hope you can make it.

Please remember we can be hard to find. My cell number is good to have. 617-686-6080 Drive past the school on your Left. Then park on street. We are at the VERY END of the brick school under the gym. Good luck:)

In rhythm spirit,
Alan
item.how_to_find_us: We'll welcome you at the door! ...and make sure you are very comfortable.
item.name: Friday Night Drum Circle - November 7th - 7PM - 9PM
